Definition: Encounter data model implemented in UnEMR
Type of medical consultation (e.g. outpatient, inpatient, emergency)
Purpose of the consultation (e.g. check-up, follow-up, new health issue)
Provider who is involved with this patient consultation

Short: Age of the patient on consultation
Definition: Age of the patient during the consultation
Issues identified by the patient. Values are selected from SNOMED-CT or ICD-10

Short: Review of the skin and glands
Definition: Review of the skin and glands

Short: Patient blood oxygenation levels during consultation
Definition: Patient blood oxygenation levels during consultation
Physical examination results on the patient's cardiovascular system
Physical examination results on the patient's pulmonary system
Physical examination results on the patient's gastrointestinal system
Physical examination results on the patient's reproductive system
Physical examination results on the patient's extremities
Physical examination results on the patient's skin
Physical examination results on the patient's genitourinary system
Physical examination results on the patient's nervous system
Patient treatment plan and procedures. Values may be selected from SNOMED-CT

Short: Medication prescribed by the provider to the patient
Definition: Medication prescribed by the provider to the patient. Values may be selected from SNOMED-CT

Short: Describes whether the treatment was successful or not
Definition: Describes whether the treatment was successful or not. Options are either positive, negative, or no change
Person who created the encounter record

Short: Date when the encounter record was created
Definition: Date when the encounter record was created

Short: Person who recently updated the record
Definition: Person who recently updated the record

Short: Date when the encounter record last updated
Definition: Date when the encounter record last updated
